column5: Hi all--sorry if this has been addressed already..... Planning on applying for my 2023 RABC Permit this week,and am noticing that on the 'lists of primary identity documentation' that proof of COVID-19 vaccination must be included. Am I looking at something that is outdated? I thought the borders were wide open now, and that this COVID doc. requirement has been repealed. Thanks in advance. As mentioned, maybe I am looking at something outdated, or perhaps the Canadian govt. is not even accepting these applications yet?
See if this link helps - I do not see a reference to vaccine status.https://www.cbsa-asfc.gc.ca/services...fre-1-eng.html
